trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have unlocked all trophies in Safe House. Your dedication, skill, and perseverance have made you a true master of the game. Enjoy the fruits of your labor and continue to dominate the safe house environment.

Win 10 games as the rat. Showcase your stealthy skills and cunning tactics as you emerge victorious in 10 games while playing as the rat. Outmaneuver the clean players and secure your place as the ultimate intruder.
Win 10 games as clean. Uphold the integrity of the safe house by winning 10 games as the clean player. Foil the rat players' plans and maintain a secure environment for everyone.
Explode 10 safes. Unleash the power of controlled demolition by successfully detonating 10 safes. Strategically plant explosive devices and witness the destructive beauty of your work.
Earn 10000 money. Accumulate a total of 10000 money through your hard work and successful ventures. Witness your wealth grow steadily.
Reach level 10. Earn experience and harden your skills and level. Reaching level 10 marks your first steps in Safehouse.
Play a total of 20 matches. Engage in 20 intense matches within the safe house environment. Whether you emerge as the victor or face defeat, every battle shapes your skills and experience.
Win 30 games as the rat. Establish your dominance and reign supreme by winning 30 games as the rat. Outsmart, outmaneuver, and outplay the clean players to assert your position as the Rat King.

Win 30 games as clean. Prove your unwavering commitment to maintaining order and security by winning 30 games as the clean player. Thwart the rat players' attempts and ensure the safe house remains clean and protected.
Explode 30 safes. Showcase your expertise in explosive demolitions by skillfully detonating 30 safes. Embrace the power of controlled chaos and witness the spectacular results.
Earn 15000 money. Reach a significant financial milestone by accumulating a total of 15000 money. See your wealth grow as a testament to your success.
Reach level 30. Continue earning experience and increasing your level. Reaching level 30 marks your next steps in Safehouse.

Play a total of 60 matches. Embrace the relentless battles within the safe house by participating in 60 matches. Every match hones your skills and contributes to the ongoing struggle between rats and clean players.
Win 50 games as the rat. Ascend to the pinnacle of rat domination by emerging victorious in 50 games. Show your unrivaled skill and cunning as you lead your fellow rats to triumph.
Win 50 games as clean. Stand as the ultimate defender of purity and order by winning 50 games as the clean player. Foil the rats' attempts and maintain a pristine environment within the safe house.
Explode 50 safes. Become a true master of demolitions by skillfully detonating 50 safes. Harness the destructive power at your disposal and leave a trail of controlled chaos in your wake.
Earn 20000 money. Gather an enormous amount of wealth by accumulating a total of 20000 money. Behold your financial level grow before your eyes.
Reach level 50. Through your hard work and experience gain you proved that you became a trully experienced gangster in Safehouse, level 50 being a huge milestone and aproval for this.

Play a total of 100 matches. Cement your legacy as a true Safe House legend by participating in 100 matches. Your presence and actions shape the outcome of the ongoing struggle between rats and clean players.
Unlock all outfits. Showcase your sense of style and unlock every available outfit option. Express your individuality and make a fashion statement within the safe house.

Fully upgrade your safe house. Transform your safe house into a fortress of security and luxury by fully upgrading every aspect. Unleash its full potential and create the ultimate haven for your operations.
